vsParam:
Hey, [px]!?
Pull yourself together... Hey ahhh!

What's with the explosion just now?
Hey, are you guys alright?
The room is in a mess... Oh, did you fail in synthesizing?

Ah, ah ha ha... Sorry to scare you!
[px], let's clean it up!
T, this is very common, ah ha ha!
This is unavoidable in synthesis, yeah.

Uh... Don't pretend to smile.
Your faces are covered in coal ash...

Let alone if it can be avoided...
Ah, hey, watch your step! Be careful!

That's alright!
We'll clean it up very quickly! Let me think, let me think...

Um, why are you so panic?
I'll clean it with you, calm down first.

And... Judging from your face, you didn't rest well, did you?
I guess you got too concentrated in synthesis...

Uh, uh!?
Ah ha ha, you guess right...

We planned to make another medicine in the commission...
But we dozed off.

I understand you, but that doesn't give you a reason to force
yourself, it will be dangerous if the synthesis fails... Hey!

Ah, gee, [px]!
We must wipe the spilled medicine clean!

Let me see... Clean equipment goes here!
Undamaged materials go to there!

Gee, you don't listen at all...
Ah, leave here to me! I'll clean it up!

Logy, sorry!
All the evidences... Uh, are wiped out...

The evidences must have vanished in such an violent explosion...
Ha-ha, I'd feel the same thing in my original world...

Alright~! The remedial work is done!
Now we need to find materials, and continue synthesizing!

... Hey, can I come with you?
I want to see alchemy in this world.

Sure, of course!
Let's go find the materials!

I think it's better if you take a rest first...
But, seeing how energetic you are, I can just forget it...

Thanks to Logy's help,
the collection went very well! Thank you!

You are welcome. I also learnt lots of knowledge.
With alchemical Cauldron... The item must be made one by one.
It'll be great if we can make many at a time...

Ha ha...
The alchemy in our world can't do that.

Well... The alchemy I know is fundamentally different
from your alchemy.

Your alchemy doesn't require an alchemical Cauldron, right?
How do you do it then?

We synthesize items with special equipment.
And we call it "centralized alchemy"...

We have equipment for medicine, bombs and other items...
This alchemy values efficiency, anyone who can use the
equipment can master alchemy.

That's amazing!
But one alchemical Cauldron wouldn't be enough, right?

Yeah. The alchemists will decide which part to take
based on the synthesis.

So that means your alchemy is all about
knowledge sharing and division of labor?

Yep. We don't have that one equipment to
make everything, we are very flexible...

But through division of labor and cooperation among many
people, we can make items with comparable quality.

After all, some items can only be made using special equipment.
So, I guess our alchemy also has its merits.

Hmm. There are really a great variety of alchemy.
I really look forward to seeing Logy's alchemy, [px]!
